title: During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
body:
Epoch 0/150: 100%|██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 24/24 [01:16<00:00,  2.64s/it]

Traceback (most recent call last):

    data = self._next_data()

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

    train(opts)
  File "train.py", line 333, in train

  File "/nfs/cold_project/sunjianwei/research/pase/pase/models/WorkerScheduler/trainer.py", line 265, in train_
    device=device)
  File "/nfs/cold_project/sunjianwei/research/pase/pase/models/WorkerScheduler/trainer.py", line 298, in _eval

    data = self._next_data()
  File "/home/luban/sunjianwei/tf2.0_py3.6_all_luban/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 831, in _next_data

Please help me~~~
